text:
@SenSchumer Seriously, what will testing accomplish?  If someone tests negative and goes food shopping, they can easily contract the virus immediately after being tested.

Worldwide perspective (from WHO)
Covid-19 - 265k deaths/yr
Diabetes - 1.6M deaths/yr
High Cholesterol - 2.6M deaths/yr
